pages.title: It's Only Natural
pages.text: $(item)Gold Leaf$(), along with the $(item)Charoite gems$() from the $(thing)Everbright$() and $(thing)Everdawn$() were the final missing ingredients to be able to construst a $(item)Terrestrial Agglomeration Plate$().$(br)In its default configuration, this device allows creation of the most powerful $(thing)Mana$() attuned material - $(item)Terrasteel$().
Creating the $(item)Natural Altar$() using the $(l:quests/chap4/02forestritual)Ritual of the Forest$().

pages.name: Natural Altar
pages.text: How to assemble the $(item)Natural Altar$(). Note the block under the altar is empty, so can be used for automation.
